actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to establish the United States Agency for World Peace within the Department of State.

summary.text: World Peace Agency Act - Establishes a United States Agency for World Peace within the Department of State to research problems relating to achieving peace. Requires the Director of the Agency to establish a Laboratory for Peace to administer and develop its research programs. Requires the Director to make recommendations to the President and government agencies concerning United States efforts for peace.

titles.title: A bill to establish the United States Agency for World Peace within the Department of State.
